InvBatchDraftToPostedRun.name: InvBatchDraftToPostedRun
InvBatchDraftToPostedRun.description: Represents information about the batch job that posts all invoices with the status as Draft that are generated by the invoice batch run associated with the billing schedule.

Comments.description: Additional notes or comments for the invoice batch draft to posted run record.

CompletionDateTime.description: The completion date and time of this invoice batch draft to posted run process.

CreditApplicationStatus.description: The status of a credit application to the invoices that are posted by the invoice batch draft to posted run process.

InvBatchDraftToPostedRunNumber.description: Required. The auto-generated number of the invoice batch draft to posted run record.

InvoiceBatchRunId.description: Required. The ID of the invoice batch run record associated with the invoice batch draft to posted run record.

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp when the current user last accessed an invoice batch draft to posted run record indirectly, for example, through a list view or related record.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp when the current user last viewed an invoice batch draft to posted run record. If this value is null, itâ€™s possible that the user only accessed the invoice batch draft to posted run record or a related list view (LastReferencedDate), but not viewed the invoice batch draft to posted run record itself.

StartDateTime.description: Required. The start date and time of the invoice batch draft to posted run process.

Status.description: Required. The status of the invoice batch draft to posted run record.

TotalDraftInvoicesSelected.description: The total number of invoices that are selected to be processed by the invoice batch draft to posted run process.

TotalInvoiceAmount.description: The total amount of all the invoices posted by the invoice batch draft to posted run process.

TotalInvoicesFailed.description: The total number of invoices that the invoice batch draft to posted run process failed to post.

TotalPostedInvoices.description: The total number of invoices posted by the invoice batch draft to posted run process.
